channel.title: Jess Klein is a maker
channel.description: Recent content on Jess Klein is a maker

item.title: Hackasaurus
item.description: TRY HACKASAURUS VIEW A HACKASAURUS DEMO TRY LOVEBOMB VIEW A LOVEBOMB BLOGPOST CHALLENGE It’s difficult to ask teens to go into sandbox environments to learn how to edit the Web. ENGAGEMENT STRATEGY Run hack-jams with the New York and Chicago Public Libraries to user test how might we design web development learning experiences that meet youth where they are on the Web. DESIGN STRATEGY Help teens hack the websites that they regularly visit.
